form_elements.plugin_data: {"initial": "", "name": "description", "help_text": "Describe your project or collective and the skills or abilities you can offer the cooperative", "required": false, "placeholder": "", "label": "Description"}

{"initial": null, "required": true, "name": "freedomcoopshares", "help_text": "Individual full member: min. 1 share = 30 \u20ac / \r\nCollective full member: min. 2 shares = 60 \u20ac", "max_value": null, "min_value": 1, "placeholder": "", "label": "Number of Shares"}

{"max_length": 255, "name": "fairnetwork_username", "help_text": "The username you use in the FairNetwork at https://fair.coop", "required": false, "initial": "", "placeholder": "", "label": "FairNetwork Username"}

{"max_length": 255, "name": "usefaircoin_profile", "help_text": "If you are in the directory at https://use.fair-coin.org please add the URL to your profile.", "required": false, "initial": "", "placeholder": "", "label": "UseFaircoin Profile"}

{"max_length": 255, "name": "fairmarket_shop", "help_text": "If you have an online shop at https://market.fair.coop please add the URL to your fair shop.", "required": false, "initial": "", "placeholder": "", "label": "FairMarket Shop"}

{"max_length": 255, "name": "otherfaircoopparticipantsreferences", "help_text": "", "required": false, "initial": "", "placeholder": "", "label": "Are there any FairCoop participant(s) who can give references about you? If so, who?"}
